title: Combine Recap - TE, QB, & WR + Player Interviews
itunes:title: Combine Recap - TE, QB, & WR + Player Interviews
description:
Bucky Brooks and Lance Zierlein are back with a special new episode from the 2020 NFL Scouting Combine. To start off, the guys recap what they saw from the tight ends at the combine (:45). After that, Bucky talks with LSU tight end Thaddeus Moss about why he's a special player, QB Joe Burrow and about his father Randy Moss (6:58). Next, the pair analyze which quarterbacks stood out at the combine (13:41). Then, Bucky interviews Oklahoma QB Jalen Hurts about his performance and his college experiences (20:01). Next, the duo look at which wide receivers impressed them (28:50). To wrap up the show, Bucky asks Alabama wide receiver Jerry Jeudy about his day (35:14).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
